attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cadwell Close Play Area, Cudworth,  was Registered as a Town/Village Green on 29/01/2009, yet Barnsley Council has done nothing to enforce that status, since the landowner continues to have fencing enclosing and encroaching the Green, drives upon it, endangering children and refuses to allow it to be maintained.
